Package org.team.pada.unibook.data

Class Professor

java.lang.Object
org.team.pada.unibook.data.Person
org.team.pada.unibook.data.Professor
public class Professor extends Person
Represents a professor, extending the Person class. This class contains information about the professor, including their ID and specialty.

  • Field Summary
